statements.update: update ASET_KOREKSI set TGLBAKOREKSI=#Tglbakoreksi#, URAIBAKOREKSI=#Uraibakoreksi# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOBAKOREKSI=#Nobakoreksi#
update ASET_KOREKSI set TGLVALID=#Tglvalid# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOBAKOREKSI=#Nobakoreksi#
update ASET_KOREKSI set TGLVALID=null where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOBAKOREKSI=#Nobakoreksi#
update ASET_KOREKSI set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update ASET_KOREKSI set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, A.NOBAKOREKSI, A.TGLBAKOREKSI, A.URAIBAKOREKSI, A.KDTANS, J.NMTRANS, A.TGLVALID from ASET_KOREKSI A left join DAFTUNIT D ON D.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY left join JTRANS J ON J.KDTANS = A.KDTANS
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and year(A.TGLBAKOREKSI) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and year(A.TGLBAKOREKSI) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
select COUNT(*) JMLDATA from ASET_KOREKSIDET A where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOBAKOREKSI=#Nobakoreksi#

select sum(x.NOBAKOREKSI) as JMLKIB from ( select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBADET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBBDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBCDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBDDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBEDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAKOREKSI from ASET_KIBGDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nobakoreksi# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#) x
